description: Detects the creation of files with certain extensions on a static web site. This can be indicative of potential uploads of a web shell.
author: Beyu Denis
oscd.community
Tim Shelton
Thurein Oo
false_positives: Legitimate administrator or developer creating legitimate executable files in a web application folder
name: Potential Webshell Creation On Static Website
query: (event.category:file AND (((file.path:/.*\\[Ii][Nn][Ee][Tt][Pp][Uu][Bb]\\[Ww][Ww][Ww][Rr][Oo][Oo][Tt]\\.*/ AND file.path:(/.*\.[Aa][Ss][Hh][Xx].*/ OR /.*\.[Aa][Ss][Pp].*/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Hh].*/ OR /.*\.[Ss][Oo][Aa][Pp].*/))) OR ((file.path:(/.*\\[Ww][Ww][Ww]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Hh][Tt][Dd][Oo][Cc][Ss]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Hh][Tt][Mm][Ll]\\.*/) AND file.path:/.*\.[Pp][Hh].*/))) AND (NOT ((file.path:(/.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/)) OR (process.executable.text:"System") OR (file.path:/.*\\[Xx][Aa][Mm][Pp][Pp].*/))))
references: PT ESC rule and personal experience
